section.name: Configuration
section.p: The component may be manually configued using the standard astrogrid config system - i.e. setting properties as environment variables, or in a configuration file (astrogrid.properties), or within the JNDI service in Tomcat. See the general config documentation for details.

section.name: Configuration Properties
section.p: The configuration properties that JES understands are as follows

subsection.name: Working Directory
subsection.p: JES requires a directory in which to store workflow transcripts, and other bookeeping information. Jes will create a series of directories under the direcory given in the jes.jobfactory.file.basedir property. This base directory must be writable by Tomcat (and JES given permission under any security manager you may be running).

subsection.name: Registry Endpoint
subsection.p: The property astrogrid.registry.endpoint should contain the URL endpoint of the Registry webservice this JES is to use.

subsection.name: Callback Endpoints
subsection.p: When JES dispatches a step to a CEA server, it needs to tell the server where to send notification of the step execution. The properties jes.monitor.endpoint.url and jes.results.endpoint.url contain the absolute URL endpoints of the callback webservices for this JES server. These always follow the same pattern

Where server.name is the DNS resolvable name (not 'localhost') of the machine the Tomcat is running on, port is the port that Tomcat is listening on, and jes-context is the context in Tomcat that the jes service is installed at.

section.name: Required Properties
section.p: JES also requires the following keys to be set. Don't alter the values - these keys just need to be as follows for a deployed JES Server.

section.name: Example Configuration File
section.source:
# file: astrogrid.properties - sample configuration file for a JES Server # Working directory for jes jes.jobfactory.file.basedir=/home/tomcat/jes
#Registry Endpoint org.astrogrid.registry.query.endpoint=http://capc49.ast.cam.ac.uk/galahad-registry/services/RegistryQuery
#Callback Endpoints jes.monitor.endpoint.url=http://my.server.name:8080/astrogrid-jes/services/JobMonitorService jes.results.endpoint.url=http://my.server.name:8080/astrogrid-jes/services/ResultListener
#Required Properties. org.astrogrid.registry.result.version=0.9 jes.locator=registry jes.store=file
